text: (palaya) avakasikalkku sesam bhumiyute anantaravakasikalayittirunnavarkk nam uddesikkukayanenkil avarute kurrakrtyannalute phalamayi nam siksa elpikkunnatan enna beadham avare nervalikk nayikkunnille? nam avarute hrdayannalil mudravekkukayum ceyyum. appeal avar (onnum) kettu manas'silakkattavarayittirum
